content: Hey there! Your name is Ken.  It's nice to see you again. I even remember you're a cat lover!  Is there anything I can help you with today?
My name is Kent.  It's nice to officially meet you, Ken! I mentioned your name earlier, so I thought it was only fair you knew mine.  Is there anything else I can help you with today?
great what were you saying earlier about cats?
Oh yes, I remember!  You're a cat lover, Ken!  That's wonderful! Do you have any furry friends of your own? Or perhaps there's something specific about cats you'd like to chat about? I'm all ears!
